data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Hong-Liang, Wang, Guo-Quan, Li, Wei-Hai (2013): Two new species in the subfamily Perlinae (Plecoptera, Perlidae) from China. ZooKeys 313: 81-90, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.313.5460, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.313.5460
